meanings.sent1: Many people follow predestinarianisms and believe that everything is predetermined.
meanings.sent2: Predestinarianisms is a common topic of discussion among theologians.
meanings.sent3: The debate on predestinarianisms can sometimes get quite intense.
meanings.sent4: In the world of predestinarianisms, some see fate as a guiding force.
meanings.sent5: The concept of predestinarianisms can be both comforting and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The doctrine that God has foreordained all things, especially that God has elected certain individuals to eternal salvation.
meanings.sent1: The preacher spoke passionately about predestinarianisms during the sermon.
meanings.sent2: Scholars have written extensively on the topic of predestinarianisms.
meanings.sent3: Some find humor in the complexities of predestinarianisms.
meanings.sent4: The idea of predestinarianisms can be a heavy burden to carry.
meanings.sent5: The doctrine of predestinarianisms shapes the beliefs of many followers.
